body.name: MAM Air Night & Day Baby Pacifier, for Sensitive Skin, Glows in The Dark, 6-16 Months, Girl, 3 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 28 - March 4 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: DESIGNED FOR BABIES WITH SENSITIVE SKIN: Large open air holes on silicone pacifier allows for maximum airflow to the face so sensitive skin can breathe.
GLOWS IN THE DARK: One night pacifier for baby glows in the dark, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, helping your baby sleep better.
MADE FOR 6+ MONTHS BABIES: Our pacifier nipple is the best pacifier for breastfed babies, designed by parents and medical experts to feel like mother’s breast to comfort and soothe.
SYMMETRICAL SILICONE PACIFIER: The BPA-free silicone pacifiers for breastfed babies are made with our silky SkinSoft material and a symmetrical design that's ideal for jaw and teeth development.

HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
body.description: The MAM Air Day & Night Collection pacifiers for baby has a shield that is specially designed for babies 6+ months with sensitive skin. The extra wide air holes allow plenty of circulation around your baby's mouth and even allow you to peek at their little smile. One pacifier in this pack has a special glow in the dark feature that helps keep your baby's silicone pacifier in sight without having to turn on the light and disturb their sleep. All MAM pacifiers feature our trademarked SkinSoft silicone nipples that feel like mom and help babies transition from being breastfed to using a pacifier. In fact, market research showed that MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested*. The textured nipple stays easily in baby's mouth and is just the right size for your 6+ months old baby so their growing teeth, palate, and jaw will be safe. The symmetrical orthodontic nipple shape means you won't have to worry about uneven pressure or fussing to turn the pacifier "right side up". **Market research 2010-2020, tested with 1,572 babies

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 40 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Air Day & Night Orthodontic Pacifiers 2 Air Pacifiers and 1 Air Night Glow-in-the-Dark Pacifier MAM's BPA/BPS-free Air Day & Night Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 6+ months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society SkinSoft silicone nipple feels soft and familiar like mom Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Extra large shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Extra large air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Symmetrical nipple promotes healthy oral development by reducing pressure on incoming teeth SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Easy to find at night

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Air Pacifier MAM Air Day & Night Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier 6+ Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 3 2 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helpful to read the instructions for clearing the water :)
reviews.reviewText: These pacifiers are great! IF you read the instructions and know how to clean them.So apparently these bigger ones (next level up from the newborn ones) are made differently in that they collect water in the nipple, but it can be emptied out during washing if you squeeze the nipple part with the plastic closer to the ground/ sideways. I've found that when washing, you can squeeze the nipple when holding the plastic part under the water to suck in water to "rinse" the inside and then you can squeeze and shake it to empty. Then dry as regular and it should be fine.If you end up having a problem or it's not clearing well, you can always reach out to Mam and they will help you out! Both my husband and MIL didn't know this and I had to tell them because I was the only one who read the directions lolOtherwise, these have been working well since baby has been teething and drooling nonstop! It helps keep the saliva off the face and reduce rash.The 3 pack does not have the sterilizing case though - seems like only the 2 packs do. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the only pacifiers that my baby will take. We have tried at least 10 other brands. I love that they glow in the dark, so they are easy to find a night highly recommend!
